General.Name: Seojin Automotive Co.Ltd
General.Description: Seojin Automotive Co.,Ltd. produces, supplies, and sells automobile clutches and components. Its products include clutch covers, discs, and facings; fly wheels; release bearings for passenger cars and commercial vehicles; and automatic transmission parts, including retainer and clutch assy, disk jets, drums, wet clutches, break bands, separator plates, lockup dumpers, drive plates, park pawls, signal plates, and spring packs. Seojin Automotive Co.,Ltd. sells its products in South Korea, the Americas, Asia, the Middle East, Europe, and Africa. The company was formerly known as Seojin Clutch Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Seojin Automotive Co.,Ltd. in June 2011. Seojin Automotive Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is based in Siheung, South Korea.
General.Address: 1280-9, #609, 3Na, Sihwa Ind. Complex, Siheung-Si, South Korea
